problems.text: A tank is filled with 10 liters of water every 30 minutes. How much water is added after 6 intervals?
A plant grows 3 cm each week. If it was 5 cm tall at the start, how tall will it be after 8 weeks?
A brick tower increases by 3 bricks per layer. The first layer has 7 bricks. How many bricks are in the 20th layer?
A student saves ₱200 in the first month and increases the amount saved by ₱50 each month. How much will he save in the 6th month?
